record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 6041
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 6041 -- (House of Representatives - May 21, 2008)

[Page: H4401]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that my name be removed as a cosponsor from H.R. 6041.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Texas?
